      • blockAddress

        public void blockAddress(java.lang.String address)

      • blockAddress

        public void blockAddress(java.lang.String address,
                         int timeout)
        Block an address (no packets will be handled from this address), for the specified timeout.
        Parameters:
        address - The address of the client in the format of ([IP]:[Port]).
        timeout - The timeout value in milliseconds. If -1, the address will be blocked forever.
